name: Aurora (itch) (Hypnotic Owl, dr.hackenstein, Crabman)
description:
AURORA is the first project we undertook as Hypnotic Owl, an early prototype of an idea that didn't quite work out. Since then, the idea has gone through many revisions and maybe someday, we'll see the final result.

For now, you can work yourself through the timeloop, trying to stop the ship from exploding over and over again.
